DOC.detailed_description: The study multi-central , control , randomized Phase III trial . The protocol approve Ethics Committee Beijing Cancer Hospital . The primary endpoint 3-year progression-free survival ( PFS ) rate . The secondary endpoint overall survival ( OS ) safety .
